dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4875 IH: Doctors in our Borders Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Lawler (for himself, Ms. Salazar, Mr. Thanedar, Mr. Ciscomani, Mr. Bucshon, Mrs. Hinson, Mr. LaLota, Ms. Clarke of New York, and Mr. Schneider) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to increase the number of physicians who may be provided Conrad 30 waivers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Doctors in our Borders Act.
Section 214(l)(1)(B) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1184(l)(1)(B)) is amended by striking to exceed 30 and inserting to exceed 100.
